natural solution: For $0 \le x < 2,$ \[f(x) = 2x < 4.\]For $2 \le x \le 4,$ \[f(x) = 8 - 2x \le 8 - 2 \cdot 2 = 4.\]Thus, the maximum value of $f(x)$ is $\boxed{4}.$
